item.title: End ID-21 East at ID-75
item.description: End ID-21 East at ID-75. Use ID-75 south for Sun Valley. Use ID-75 north for Lower Stanley and Salmon.

item.title: End ID-21 South at I-84 in Boise
item.description: End ID-21 South at I-84 in Boise. Use right lanes for I-84 West; left lanes for I-84 East and for Gowen Road.

item.title: ID-21 West - Boise City Limit
item.description: Entering Boise on ID-21 west - Population 205, 671. Boise is the capital of Idaho and the largest city in Idaho.

item.title: Begin ID-21 North at I-84
item.description: Begin ID-21 North at I-84. Use left lane for I-84 west; use right lane for Southbound Federal Way.

item.title: End ID-21 East at ID-75
item.description: End ID-21 East at ID-75 in Stanley.

item.title: ID-21 East - Entering Stanley
item.description: Entering Stanley on ID-21 East - Population 63. Speed Limit 35 MPH.

item.title: ID-21 East at Mores Creek Summit
item.description: ID-21 east at Mores Creek Summit. Turn left for Pilot Peak Lookout and Placerville; right for Sunset Mountain Lookout.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 57 Offramp at ID-21
item.description: I-84 East Exit 57 Offramp at ID-21. Turn left for ID-21 east to Idaho City; turn right for Gowen Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 57
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 57 - ID-21/Idaho City/Gowen Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 57
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 57 - ID-21/Idaho City/Gowen Road.

item.title: ID-21 South - Banks-Lowman Highway Jct.
item.description: ID-21 South at Banks-Lowman Highway Jct. Use the Banks-Lowman Highway for Garden Valley and Banks.

item.title: ID-21 South - Entering Lowman
item.description: Entering Lowman on ID-21 south.

item.title: ID-21 South - Grandjean Jct.
item.description: ID-21 south at Grandjean Jct.

item.title: ID-21 South - Avalanche Area
item.description: Entering Avalanche Zone on ID-21 south. This area south of Banner Summit has frequent avalanches in the winter, which causes road closures.

item.title: ID-21 - Entering Boise County
item.description: Entering Boise County along ID-21 south. The Boise-Custer County Line is located on Banner Summit - Elevation 7037 Feet.

item.title: ID-21 North - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-21 North - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway. The Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway runs along ID-21 between Boise and Stanley.

item.title: ID-21 - Truck Restrictions
item.description: Truck restrictions on ID-21 between Lowman and Idaho City.

item.title: ID-75 North at ID-21 South
item.description: ID-75 North at ID-21 South. Use ID-75 north for Lower Stanley and Salmon. Use ID-21 south for Boise. The Salmon River can be seen in the background of the picture.

item.title: ID-75 North at ID-21 South
item.description: ID-21 Junction on ID-75 North in Stanley.

item.title: ID-75 North Approaching ID-21
item.description: Approaching ID-21 Junction on ID-75 North in Stanley. Milemarker 189.

item.title: ID-21 North - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on ID-21 North to Idaho City, Lowman, and Stanley.

item.title: Begin ID-21 West - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: Begin ID-21 West - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway

item.title: ID-75 South at ID-21 North
item.description: ID-75 south at ID-21 west to Boise.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 57
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 57, ID-21 to Idaho City

item.title: End Banks-Lowman Hwy. at ID-21
item.description: Junction ID-21 with Banks-Lowman Road

item.description: ID-21/Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway Sign.

item.title: End ID-21 East at ID-75
item.description: End ID-21 East at ID-75. Use ID-75 south for Sun Valley. Use ID-75 north for Lower Stanley and Salmon.

item.title: ID-21 East Approaching ID-75
item.description: ID-21 East approaching ID-75 in Stanley. ID-21 east ends here,

item.title: ID-21 West - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway on ID-21 west. The Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway starts here in Stanley and follows ID-21 west to Boise.
